# numberOfPreviewItems(in:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the number of items that the preview panel should preview.

## Declaration

```swift
func numberOfPreviewItems(in panel: QLPreviewPanel!) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **panel**: The preview panel.

## Return Value

The number of items the preview panel should display.

## Required Methods

- **previewPanel(_:previewItemAt:)**: Returns the item that the preview panel should preview at a given index.

items.description: Returns the item that the preview panel should preview at a given index.
items.name: previewPanel(_:previewItemAt:)
